entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
